message:
We are going to organise a rally against the brutality which happened on 5th may night in our beloved country Bangladesh..rally will be held at Martin Place station, Sydney,NSW. it will start from 11.0 am until 1.0 pm. Please do join the rally to support and raise voice against the injustice in Bangladesh. please promote this page http://www.facebook.com/pages/Stop-Genocide-Bring-Humanity/189804211172806.
May ALLAH bless you.

(Fan post)
